definition: surname Wei/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1066-221 BC), located in present day Henan and Hebei Provinces
to guard/to protect/to defend/abbr. for 衛生|卫生, hygiene/health/abbr. for 衛生間|卫生间, toilet
member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker

sentences.english: Security guard to maintain law and order.
sentences.chinese: 維護法律和秩序安全衛士。

sentences.english: For over ten years, the chief bodyguard only got drunk this time.
sentences.chinese: 十幾年接觸中，衛士長李銀橋只醉過這麼一次。

sentences.english: We are the true adherents of liberty.
sentences.chinese: 我們纔是自由的真正忠誠衛士。

sentences.english: The yeoman warders manage it now.
sentences.chinese: 如今是御用侍從衛士在管理。

sentences.english: The men used handcuffs and tape to restrain security guards.
sentences.chinese: 男子用手銬和膠帶來約束安全衛士。

sentences.english: Starts from me, be civilization small guards, I love the nature.
sentences.chinese: 從我做起，成爲文明小衛士，我愛大自然。

sentences.english: In addition to all these, he is also the guardian and representative of corporate America.
sentences.chinese: 除了這些以外，他還是公司化美國的衛士和代表。

sentences.english: He was a guard of [ gigantic] strength.
sentences.chinese: 他是個具有巨人般力氣的衛士。

sentences.english: Anti-corporate activists sometimes claim that big companies are mightier than governments.
sentences.chinese: 還有些時候，反公司衛士們聲稱公司比政府強大的多。

sentences.english: Ryel's eyes narrowed and he nodded to his guard.
sentences.chinese: 雷爾眼睛眯起來，向他的衛士們點點頭。

sentences.english: Therefore, selenium is called "the kindling of life" and "bodyguard of health".
sentences.chinese: 因此，硒元素被稱爲“生命的火種，健康的衛士”。

sentences.english: Wrap-around fork guards provide excellent protection for the sliders.
sentences.chinese: 纏繞叉衛士提供的滑塊的保護。

sentences.english: Raylou and her pacifists require a boatload of quiet.
sentences.chinese: 蕾露和她那些和平衛士們需要大把的安靜。

sentences.english: Please spare his life this time. " Without waiting for Kan Ning to finish, Chou Yu ordered his guards to beat him."
sentences.chinese: 周瑜不等他說完，叫衛士們一陣亂棒把甘寧打了出去。

sentences.english: Robert Menard is a defender of human rights variable geometry.
sentences.chinese: 羅伯特孟納德是一個以人權衛士可變幾何形狀。

sentences.english: Once inside, the palace guards closed the doors, and the wind-deer was trapped.
sentences.chinese: 一入宮殿，衛士們立刻關上門，困住風鹿。

definition: to seize/to capture/to wrest control of
to charge and break through enemy lines
Chiangchun township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
general/high-ranking military officer/to check or checkmate/fig. to embarrass/to challenge/to put sb on the spot
to glare like a tiger watching his prey (idiom)/to eye covetously
